abstract: Los Angeles City Council vote to give Mayor Eric Garcetti more authority to manage agreements related to bid to host 2024 Olympics is postponed due to concerns about costs and about impact event will have on some neighborhoods.
lead_paragraph: Facing an early test of support at home, Los Angeles’s 2024 Olympics plan stalled amid questions about potential runaway costs and the impact on neighborhoods already strangled by traffic.

headline.main: Setback in Los Angeles’s Olympic Bid

snippet: Facing an early test of support at home, Los Angeles’s 2024 Olympics plan stalled amid questions about potential runaway costs and the impact on neighborhoods already strangled by traffic.
